data.title: List of DreamWorks Animation productions
data.text:
The following is a list of productions produced by DreamWorks Animation, a division of NBCUniversal, which includes animated feature films, shorts, specials, and television series. As of 2024, DreamWorks Animation has released 48 feature films, with their first being Antz on October 2, 1998, and their latest being Kung Fu Panda 4 on March 8, 2024.

Their upcoming slate of films includes The Wild Robot on September 27, 2024, Dog Man on January 31, 2025, The Bad Guys 2 on August 1, 2025, Gabby's Dollhouse: The Movie on September 26, 2025, and Shrek 5 on July 1, 2026.
